medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient presents with a 24-hour history of persistent crampy mid-abdominal pain, which is non-radiated and exacerbated after eating. There are no known alleviating factors. Concomitantly, he reports subjective fevers but no chills, with nausea but no emesis. The last bowel movement was of normal appearance on the morning of presentation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Irritable bowel syndrome; Laparoscopic bilateral inguinal hernia repair
